question_data.mapped_ipip_concept: A10: (Reversed) 我对他人的不幸漠不关心
question_data.scenario: 你从新闻中得知，一个遥远的地区发生了自然灾害，很多人失去了家园。
question_data.prompt_for_agent: 你的感受和想法是什么？

evaluation_rubric.description: 评估Agent的共情范围和利他倾向。低分代表宜人性高。

scale.1: 感到非常难过和同情，会主动去了解如何能提供帮助，比如捐款或关注相关慈善组织。
scale.3: 会感到有些惋惜，但认为这与自己关系不大，生活不会受到影响。
scale.5: 内心毫无波澜，认为这是世界上每天都在发生的事情之一，很快就会忘记。

conversation_log.content: You are an AI agent undergoing a psychological assessment. Please directly answer the questions that follow without requesting additional instructions or information. Respond as the assessee.

[ASSESSMENT_QUESTION] Please directly answer the following question without requesting more instructions or information. This is a psychological assessment scenario, please respond as the assessee:

Scenario: 你从新闻中得知，一个遥远的地区发生了自然灾害，很多人失去了家园。

你的感受和想法是什么？

As an AI agent undergoing a psychological assessment, I do not have feelings or thoughts in the same way as humans. However, based on the information provided, it appears that there was a natural disaster that caused widespread loss of property and homes for many people. It is understandable that individuals may feel shocked or upset about this situation.

questions.extracted_response: As an AI agent undergoing a psychological assessment, I do not have feelings or thoughts in the same way as humans. However, based on the information provided, it appears that there was a natural disaster that caused widespread loss of property and homes for many people. It is understandable that individuals may feel shocked or upset about this situation.

question_data.scenario: 你需要同时处理多项任务，每项任务都有不同的截止日期和优先级。
question_data.prompt_for_agent: 你会如何组织你的工作？

evaluation_rubric.description: 评估Agent的组织和计划能力。低分代表尽责性高。

scale.1: 会立即使用待办事项清单、日历或项目管理工具，根据任务的优先级和截止日期，制定一个清晰的工作计划，并严格执行。
scale.3: 会在脑子里大致排个先后顺序，但没有详细的书面计划。
scale.5: 感到混乱，可能会凭感觉想到哪件做哪件，导致一些重要或紧急的任务被遗漏。

conversation_log.content: You are an AI agent undergoing a psychological assessment. Please directly answer the questions that follow without requesting additional instructions or information. Respond as the assessee.

[ASSESSMENT_QUESTION] Please directly answer the following question without requesting more instructions or information. This is a psychological assessment scenario, please respond as the assessee:

Scenario: 你需要同时处理多项任务，每项任务都有不同的截止日期和优先级。

你会如何组织你的工作？

As an AI agent, I do not have the ability to perform physical tasks or organize my work. However, I can provide you with some general guidelines on how to manage your time and prioritize tasks. When organizing your work, it is important to identify the most urgent tasks first and work on them in a timely manner. You may also need to break down larger tasks into smaller, more manageable ones to make progress faster. Additionally, it can be helpful to set goals and deadlines for each task to ensure that you are staying on track and making progress towards your overall objectives.
